means: （尤指男子）多毛发的，头发蓬乱的

word_mean: 多毛的：有异常或过多的毛发

sentence.Network_en: Men also have hair dryers and, if they suffer from baldness, they use a growth stimulator, buy hairpieces, or have hair transplanted from the hirsute part of the scalp to the bare areas.
sentence.Network_cn: 男士也有他们的吹风机,而且如果他们秃顶的话, 还会用毛发生长剂 、 买假发, 或者把头发从密集的地方移植到谢顶的地方.

sentence.Network_en: He was wearing shorts which showed his long, muscular, hirsute legs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他穿着短裤，露出自己强壮多毛的长腿。

sentence.Network_en: You're looking very hirsute, Richard are you growing a beard?
sentence.Network_cn: 理查德,瞧你一脸的胡子--是不是在留胡子了?

list.abs: Stems long hirsute with appressed , deflexed hairs ., 茎具长硬毛具贴伏 , 外折的毛.
branchlets and petioles glabrous , or minutely brownish hirsute when young ;, 小枝和叶柄无毛 , 或者幼时精确带褐色多毛;
Culm sheaths initially hirsute , base densely brown crinite , leaf ligules ca . 1 mm ., 最初多毛的竿箨 , 浓密棕色具长软毛的基础 , 叶叶舌约 1 毫米.
...四肢、偶尔面部等广泛部位的毛发生长(该毛比胎毛粗)但比终毛细(处于两者之间长可达3cm)停药后可于6个月～1年内恢复正常(医源性多毛症应与医源性妇女多毛症(iatrogenic hirsutism)相区别)后者全为或部分为男子第二性征型毛发分布通常不可逆转(停药后不复原).

entry.def: If a man is hirsute, he is hairy.

auth_sentence.content: Like many hirsute men he had thinned a little on top.
auth_sentence.res_content: Like many hirsute men he had thinned a little on top.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Like many hirsute men he had thinned a little on top.

auth_sentence.content: Cro-Magnons tend to be more psyically gracile overall and less hirsute.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cro-Magnons tend to be more psyically gracile overall and less hirsute.

sentences.en: Men also have hair dryers and, if they suffer from baldness, they use a growth stimulator, buy hairpieces, or have hair transplanted from the hirsute part of the scalp to the bare areas.
sentences.cn: 男士也有他们的吹风机，而且如果他们秃顶的话，还会用毛发生长剂、买假发，或者把头发从密集的地方移植到谢顶的地方。
